original_text: And the king went up into the house of the Lord, and all the men of Judah, and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and the priests, and the Levites, and all the people, great and small: and he read in their ears all the words of the book of the covenant that was found in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 전에 올라가매 유다 모든 사람과 예루살렘 주민들과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 모든 백성이 노소를 막론하고 다 함께 한지라 왕이 여호와의 전 안에서 발견한 언약책의 모든 말씀을 읽어 무리의 귀에 들려 주고

sentences.original_text: And the king went up into house of the Lord
and all the men of Judah
and all the people, great and small:
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 자나 작은 자 모든 백성과 함께했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he read in their ears
all the words of the book of the covenant
that was found in the house of the Lord.
